resources.string: Layout for telling user that nfc is inactive
This application requires Near Field Communication which is not activated on this device, please press \"Activate NFC\" to enable NFC.
Choose item to write to tag.
To format the tag to hold NDEF specifications and message tap format at the bottom.
To erase all content on the tag making it empty, tap erase content below.
Tap tag to touchpoint to format tag.
Tap tag to touchpoint to erase all content.
Tap tag to touchpoint to lock tag (This is a one way operation and is not reversible).

Near Field Communications (NFC) is a protocol for communication between two components one passive and one active. The communication functions on short distances, less than 5 cm.
 This program can Read/Program/Format and Lock tags.

 The functions that can be written to tag is SMS,Email and Wifi networks.
 Format of tag only works when tag is not ready to handle Ndef format.
 Locking a tag makes it locked and is not writeable again.
To check tag chip compatibility with your phone here is a link for Mifare 1k, Mifare ultralight and nTag.

Writing wifi to tags can be done by using this app or on new android 5.0 and forward it can be done by long pressing a network in the network list and write to tag will pop up. This method only works for Android 5.0 and higher.
